Parameters: DownloadRequest: a @B_android#telephony#mbms#DownloadRequest_E@, indicating which download is being referenced.

FileInfo: a @B_android#telephony#mbms#FileInfo_E@ specifying the file to report progress on. Note that the request may result in many files being downloaded and the client may not have been able to get a list of them in advance.

int: The current status of the download. Value is @B_android#telephony#MbmsDownloadSession#STATUS_UNKNOWN_E@, @B_android#telephony#MbmsDownloadSession#STATUS_ACTIVELY_DOWNLOADING_E@, @B_android#telephony#MbmsDownloadSession#STATUS_PENDING_DOWNLOAD_E@, @B_android#telephony#MbmsDownloadSession#STATUS_PENDING_REPAIR_E@, or @B_android#telephony#MbmsDownloadSession#STATUS_PENDING_DOWNLOAD_WINDOW_E@
onStatusUpdated(android.telephony.mbms.D.Description: Gives download status callbacks for a file in a @B_android#telephony#mbms#DownloadRequest_E@.
onStatusUpdated(android.telephony.mbms.D.FullName: public void onStatusUpdated (DownloadRequest request, FileInfo fileInfo, int status)

ClassDesc: A optional listener class used by download clients to track progress. Apps should extend this class and pass an instance into @B_android#telephony#MbmsDownloadSession#download_E@ This is optionally specified when requesting a download and will only be called while the app is running.
